title: [Jungler main] I get reported in every single game.
body:
It doesn't matter the reason:

I pick Nida jungler: "report Nida trollpick" (like srsly, who in Gold 2 still thinks that Nida is trollpick)
A lane loses: "report jungler 0 ganks"
I get fed: "report jungler ks", "you only play for the score", "score doesn't matter" (usually comming of 0/5+ people that flame me then report me bc I "take their kills")

Even if I gank another lane and we win it, another lane loses and they report me because I'm not there.

What bothers me even more is that usually that's coming of premades. If I'm on a higher pick order and pick something I feel like I want to play they report me bc I took their mate's role. If they feed all of them report me bc I don't help them. Idc to be flammed, I'm used to it as I've been maining jungle for 3 seasons, but I'm tired of getting report warnings literally every day, what use to result in chat restriction or ranked restriction.

Some time ago my ranked restriction finished, and 3 days later there it was another ranked + chat restriction. Really Riot, bring back the Tribunal, we need it, or people will keep abusing the actual system.

replies.body:
I get reported for dumb reasons too, but I've never received a restriction of any kind.  In fact, just a couple days ago I got reported for building Runaans on Kalista because "Runaans is a troll item"

The system isn't being abused. If you're actually being punished then take a step back and consider that you may be doing something wrong.

The problem is that you arent told what you did "wrong". and that people still report you for rediculus things all the time(i.e. autolocking in a b5 blind pick normal game, and harrassing you all game)

Dude, your name. Darky? You are lucky if you don't get reported just for that.

I have literally never received a warning. Not saying I've never been reported. I can only say that if you are getting so many chat and play restrictions, you must either be toxic as hell or much worse than your rating implies.

Looking at your match stats, you almost never ward. You consistently have the most damage received on your team. Your KDA and damage dealt to champs are all over the place. When playing solo queue, you seem to be about even with just as many and lengthy winning streaks as losing streaks. But your Team Ranked games are almost all wins.

Analysis: You are being carried hard by your ranked team and should probably not be in your current division. When you are deprived of your team, you play at your actual skill level rather than getting carried. This is why you get flamed in solo queue in your division.

Is this an actual troll? Flaming some1 becus he plays worse than the rest? There is NO excuse to flame any1 in any game. You are judging this guy's post about behaviour based on in his game stats like wards placed, kda etc.? Do you want to imply that he deserves to get flamed? Tattling on you to the teacher won't matter if you're innocent.  So Reports don't matter unless you're actually guilty of something the Summoners code prohibits.

Well nowadays Tribunal is disabled, and there are many people reporting having these issues too. I remember a guy streaming that didn't talk in his games and he got some warnings, and eventually a chat restriction. As far I've researched, it seems that now it's automatized. Once you hit some % report rate (or x raw number of reports in y time) you get restricted. 

I say this because I got my second restriction just after playing a ranked game with a duo-bot which I didn't gank because they were losing 0-4 and their ADC had BF at min 6, they reported me at the end of the game and then I wasn't able to play ranked anymore. I asked Riot Support about this and they answered me something like "we are not removing your restrict blah blah blah". Gosh, I wonder if they even read it, I'm playing my games normally until the restriction is over, but it bugs me that I keep getting report even if I don't even talk.

You get the warnings when you get reported enough, those are automated, however Riot has stated they are personally taking care of reports now. They are not automated so if he got chat restricted he did deserve it.\

As to the second half of your message, that is the most annoying thing i've ever disliked about Riot. Their support team always gives automated responses. You ask anything about your ban/restriction/etc and their response is they won't remove it even if you didn't include anything even hinting at it being removed.

I once said in a message "I am not asking you to remove it at all, I just want to know what caused it" and got the same message AGAIN even though it had been sent to me once before in the same conversation. They don't even read your messages, it hurts.

I know that this thread is old, but I want to bump it to help spread awareness of how horrible this system that Riot has in place really is. It punishes WAY too many innocent people and it needs to be removed and replaced with a system that actually works. Riot is ignoring its community and being very childish about their mistakes. Ranked Restrictions are bad for the game and should never have been a thing. Not only are people being falsely punished, normal games have now become more toxic than ever. It is almost impossible to play a normal draft game without it being ruined by a toxic troll that Riot has funneled into this game mode. We need to spread the word and get Riot to fix their mistakes. No more innocent punishments!

My least favorite thing as jungle though is when a lane pings/asks for a gank and when I show up they just keep farming as I jump on their lane enemy. A close second is when they sit right outside the combat range waiting to last hit the kill instead of actually helping for the kill.

Honestly I stop ganking the lane of people who do that more than once because I know it's not in the team's best interest anymore.
